nodes.text: Uv Gizen was a male Human who served as an aide of Supreme Chancellor Palpatine during the Separatist Crisis.
Shortly before the Battle of Geonosis, Uv believed that the Separatists were afraid since many protests were pushed forward.
Uv Gizen is the name given in the script of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones for the character that became Sly Moore.
